org.sm.fraxion.fractals

Class AMagnetFractalIterator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sm.fraxion.fractals.AFractalIterator
      • org.sm.fraxion.fractals.AMagnetFractalIterator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MagnetTypeIFractalIterator, MagnetTypeIIFractalIterator

    public abstract class AMagnetFractalIterator
extends AFractalIterator
    The AMagnetFractalIterator class provides a base class for magnet fractals (converging and diverging).

    Note that this is an abstract class.

    Version:
    22/01/2015
    Author:
    Sven Maerivoet
